availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Green Berry (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Berry. Father of John Berry, William Berry, Alice Berry, Charles Berry, Elizabeth Berry, Henry Berry, Joseph Berry, and Kate Berry. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 71B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 485.
